channel.title: Some program might be trying access hardware directly
channel.description: Hello. After my upgrade of Whonix-Gateway I got messages like this: [ 1162.578855] atkbd serio0: Spurious NAK on isa0060/serio0. Some program might be trying access hardware directly. I'm thinking it's not very safe. What can I do with this?

item.title: Some program might be trying access hardware directly
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Nothing to worry about:
https://www.virtualbox.org/ticket/407

Read full topic
item.source: Some program might be trying access hardware directly

item.title: Some program might be trying access hardware directly
item.dc:creator: stranger98721
item.description:
Hello.
After my upgrade of Whonix-Gateway I got messages like this:
[ 1162.578855] atkbd serio0: Spurious NAK on isa0060/serio0. Some program might be trying access hardware directly.
I’m thinking it’s not very safe. What can I do with this?

Read full topic
item.source: Some program might be trying access hardware directly
